relation: Marist security can be spotted everywhere on campus. You never feel unsafe while you are on campus, and if there ever is a problem, security handles the situation in a professional matter.

Marist provides you with an aducation that comes from hard work and dedication to your studies. The professors truly care not only about your grades but you as a person. Class sized are generally no more than twenty students which means professors know you by name, not by a number. Our beautiful campus is always well kept, and students truly respect our little paradise on the Hudson as well. Students as well as professors know that it is expensive to attend Marist, and no one takes that lightly. We are serious about our educations and know that coming to Marist, there is a bright future ahead.

There is always a lot to do on campus. Being that we are right on the Hudson, students take advantage of the walking bridge, as well as hiking paths that connect right from the campus grounds. We are surrounded by great night life as well as campus activities that go on daily whether it is a sports game, musical production, or activity that campus activities creates.
The food is good for the most part and there is a lot of variety. The quality of the food gets better each year and the staff truly listens to the students requests.

Freshman dorms are just like any other dorm you can find at other colleges around the country, but each academic year,the housing gets better and better. As a sophomore you can already be living in an apartment or townhouse with your closest friends.
Marist is building a reputation for producing well rounded students. As much as students here at Marist love to hang out with their friends, they take their academics seriously as well.
You must learn to balance your academics with your social life.

Marist has been the best experience in my entire life. The friends you will make will stay with you for the rest of your life. The professors can become your greatest supporters, and I believe that is why Marist graduates are working their dream jobs not only in this country, but around the world.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you are looking for a small school with a great sense of community and if you are serious about your education, Marist could be perfect for you. Tips for prospective students If you are considering Marist be sure to attend a tour of campus, they are held regularly. Pack warmly for the winter season, the wind off of the Hudson is freezing in January, but the view is breathtaking. Marist is not a place to slack off, as most of the students are very smart and you will fall behind quickly if you don't try your best, but you will find that you have all the support you need if you ask for it. Bang for the buck Marist is expensive, especially for me as I went pretty far out of state. However, you get what you pay for; Marist is known for giving its students every resource available. the internship program is especially helpful, you can be sure that they will help you find the perfect internship (as many as you have time for!) , and that they will assist you in getting a job in the field of your interest. Am enjoying being here
